name: Policy Impact Partners Limited
goal: Policy Impact Partners (PIP) is a bespoke consultancy firm that supports companies, governments and regulators on connectivity and digital policy issues across all sectors.  PIP brings together experts with the right experience, knowledge and international networks to help clients develop and promote policies that positively impact reputation, innovation, investment and competition.
interests: Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
euInitiatives: Policy Impact Partners is involved in running a policy roundtable in Brussels. This involves a group of companies from different sectors and regions working together to improve EU policymaking around digital.
